chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall n p k : nat, (p + k < n)%nat -> forall (f : R -> R -> R) (x y : R), ex_diff_n f n x y -> ex_derive (fun z : R => partial_derive p k f z y) x

Premises:
*** [ R : Set ]
ex_derive = fun (K : AbsRing) (V : NormedModule K) (f : K -> V) (x : K) => exists l : V, is_derive f x l : forall (K : AbsRing) (V : NormedModule K), (K -> V) -> K -> Prop Arguments K, V are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [_ _ function_scope _]
f = fun f : family => let (ind, f0, _) := f in f0 : family -> R -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [_ R_scope R_scope] f is a coercion
partial_derive = fun (m k : nat) (f : R -> R -> R) (x y : R) => Derive_n (fun t : R => Derive_n (fun z : R => f t z) k y) m x : nat -> nat -> (R -> R -> R) -> R -> R -> R Argument scopes are [nat_scope nat_scope function_scope R_scope R_scope]
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat For S: Argument scope is [nat_scope]
ex_diff_n = fix ex_diff_n (f : R -> R -> R) (n : nat) (x y : R) {struct n} : Prop := continuity_2d_pt f x y /\ match n with | 0%nat => True | S n0 => ex_derive (fun z : R_AbsRing => f z y) x /\ ex_derive (fun z : R_AbsRing => f x z) y /\ ex_diff_n (fun u v : R => Derive (fun z : R => f z v) u) n0 x y /\ ex_diff_n (fun u v : R => Derive (fun z : R => f u z) v) n0 x y end : (R -> R -> R) -> nat -> R -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope nat_scope R_scope R_scope]
ex_diff_n_deriv : forall n p q : nat, (p + q <= n)%nat -> forall (f : R -> R -> R) (x y : R), ex_diff_n f n x y -> ex_diff_n (partial_derive p q f) (n - (p + q)) x y
Derive_sum_n : forall (f : nat -> R -> R) (n : nat) (x : R), (forall k : nat, (k <= n)%nat -> ex_derive (f k) x) -> Derive (fun y : R => sum_n (fun k : nat => f k y) n) x = sum_n (fun k : nat => Derive (f k) x) n
Schwarz_aux : forall (f : R -> R -> R_NormedModule) (x y : R) (eps : posreal), (forall u v : R, Rabs (u - x) < eps -> Rabs (v - y) < eps -> ex_derive (fun z : R => f z v) u /\ ex_derive (fun z : R => Derive (fun t : R => f t z) u) v) -> forall h k : R, Rabs h < eps -> Rabs k < eps -> let phi := fun k0 x0 : R => f x0 (y + k0) - f x0 y in exists u v : R, Rabs (u - x) <= Rabs h /\ Rabs (v - y) <= Rabs k /\ phi k (x + h) - phi k x = h * k * Derive (fun z : R => Derive (fun t : R => f t z) u) v
ex_diff_n_deriv_aux1 : forall (f : R -> R -> R) (n : nat) (x y : R), ex_diff_n f (S n) x y -> ex_diff_n (fun u v : R => Derive (fun z : R => f z v) u) n x y
ex_diff_n_m : forall n m : nat, (m <= n)%nat -> forall (f : R -> R -> R) (x y : R), ex_diff_n f n x y -> ex_diff_n f m x y
ex_diff_n_deriv_aux2 : forall (f : R -> R -> R) (n : nat) (x y : R), ex_diff_n f (S n) x y -> ex_diff_n (fun u v : R => Derive (fun z : R => f u z) v) n x y
partial_derive_ext_loc : forall (f g : R -> R -> R) (p q : nat) (x y : R), locally_2d (fun u v : R => f u v = g u v) x y -> partial_derive p q f x y = partial_derive p q g x y
ex_derive_sum_n : forall (f : nat -> ?K -> ?V) (n : nat) (x : ?K), (forall k : nat, (k <= n)%nat -> ex_derive (f k) x) -> ex_derive (fun y : ?K => sum_n (fun k : nat => f k y) n) x where ?K : [ |- AbsRing] ?V : [ |- NormedModule ?K]
partial_derive_add_zero : forall (f : R -> R -> R) (p q r s : nat) (x y : R), q = 0%nat \/ r = 0%nat -> partial_derive p q (partial_derive r s f) x y = partial_derive (p + r) (q + s) f x y
ex_derive_scal : forall (f : R -> R) (k x : R), ex_derive f x -> ex_derive (fun x0 : R => k * f x0) x
Schwarz : forall (f : R -> R -> R) (x y : R), locally_2d (fun u v : R => ex_derive (fun z : R => f z v) u /\ ex_derive (fun z : R => f u z) v /\ ex_derive (fun z : R => Derive (fun t : R => f z t) v) u /\ ex_derive (fun z : R => Derive (fun t : R => f t z) u) v) x y -> continuity_2d_pt (fun u v : R => Derive (fun z : R => Derive (fun t : R => f z t) v) u) x y ->...-> Derive (fun z : R => Derive (fun t : R => f z t) y) x = Derive (fun z : R => Derive (fun t : R => f t z) x) y
is_derive_scal : forall (f : R -> R) (x k df : R), is_derive f x df -> is_derive (fun x0 : R => k * f x0) x (k * df)
is_derive_sum_n : forall (f : nat -> ?K -> ?V) (n : nat) (x : ?K) (d : nat -> ?V), (forall k : nat, (k <= n)%nat -> is_derive (f k) x (d k)) -> is_derive (fun y : ?K => sum_n (fun k : nat => f k y) n) x (sum_n d n) where ?K : [ |- AbsRing] ?V : [ |- NormedModule ?K]
ex_diff_n_ext_loc : forall (f g : R -> R -> R) (n : nat) (x y : R), locally_2d (fun u v : R => f u v = g u v) x y -> ex_diff_n f n x y -> ex_diff_n g n x y
Rmin_glb_lt : forall x y z : R, z < x -> z < y -> z < Rmin x y
ex_derive_inv : forall (f : R -> R) (x : R), ex_derive f x -> f x <> 0 -> ex_derive (fun y : R => / f y) x
Nat.le_lt_add_lt : forall n m p q : nat, (n <= m)%nat -> (p + m < q + n)%nat -> (p < q)%nat
differential = fun (p : nat) (f : R -> R -> R) (x y dx dy : R) => sum_f_R0 (fun m : nat => C p m * partial_derive m (p - m) f x y * dx ^ m * dy ^ (p - m)) p : nat -> (R -> R -> R) -> R -> R -> R -> R -> R Argument scopes are [nat_scope function_scope R_scope R_scope R_scope R_scope]
plus_lt_reg_l : forall n m p : nat, (p + n < p + m)%nat -> (n < m)%nat
ex_derive_div : forall (f g : R -> R) (x : R), ex_derive f x -> ex_derive g x -> g x <> 0 -> ex_derive (fun y : R_AbsRing => f y / g y) x
Derive_inv : forall (f : R -> R) (x : R), ex_derive f x -> f x <> 0 -> Derive (fun y : R => / f y) x = - Derive f x / f x ^ 2
continuity_2d_pt = fun (f : R -> R -> R) (x y : R) => forall eps : posreal, locally_2d (fun u v : R => Rabs (f u v - f x y) < eps) x y : (R -> R -> R) -> R -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope]
Derive_div : forall (f g : R -> R) (x : R), ex_derive f x -> ex_derive g x -> g x <> 0 -> Derive (fun y : R => f y / g y) x = (Derive f x * g x - f x * Derive g x) / g x ^ 2
is_derive_inv : forall (f : R -> R) (x l : R), is_derive f x l -> f x <> 0 -> is_derive (fun y : R => / f y) x (- l / f x ^ 2)
Nat.add_le_mono : forall n m p q : nat, (n <= m)%nat -> (p <= q)%nat -> (n + p <= m + q)%nat

```coq
intros n p k H f x y H0.
apply ex_diff_n_deriv with (n:=n) (p:=p) (q:=k).
auto.
apply H0.
Qed.
```
